summary: Consume SIGNL4 API to send and resolve alerts with additional details and options.

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: The type of resource to interact with, in this case, it is 'Alert'.

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: The operation to perform on the alert, either 'Send' to send a new alert or 'Resolve' to mark an alert as resolved.

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: A more detailed description for the alert to be sent.

parameters.name: additionalFields
parameters.description: Additional fields and options for the alert, such as alerting scenario, attachments, external ID, filtering, location, service, and title.

parameters.name: externalId
parameters.description: Unique ID of the record from a 3rd party system for resolving an alert.
